short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to start and stop the endless scrolling down on the pages of sites where this is possible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to start and stop the endless scrolling down on the pages of sites where this is possible. Just click on the extension icon and the “Start” button to start scrolling and the “Stop” button to finish it.
